item.name: Beach Ball Bananza
item.description: Take on the best in this sandy spinoff of Volleyball!

item.name: Go Go GoKarts
item.description: Race against your friends in this action packed racing game!

item.name: Hammer Slammers
item.description: Compete against the clock as you try to hammer as many nails as you can!

item.name: Rockin' Robots
item.description: Battle it out as supercharged robots of the future! Can be played solo or with a friend!

item.name: Fighting Firemen
item.description: Help save the city from a rampaging fire! More points for the more fires you put out!
